data.text:
@US_China_Menu From what we can see in some countries, vaccine mandate is not effective. China achieved it by good governance and gained the trust of the ppl. 
Perhaps a bit of a push by making life a little easier for the vaxed might work but mandate will just make ppl trust them less.

@StuckupMark Elderly need a vaccine mandate (preferably at gun point).

If they were vaccine-skeptics, it means their brains have already been infected with right-wing Western brain disease.

@US_China_Menu 1) disproportionate fear about vaccine risks & side effects
2) anti China & lack of trust in govt
3) not threatened by Covid due to low cases number

I know a few who didn't get vax mainly due to 3, now decided to get them. Better late than never.
@US_China_Menu they feel they don't have the need.

I wonder if its elderly vaccine attitudes is driven by Falungong.

Perhaps, its printing presses are due for another smashing.
https://t.co/Ev1G5ITaJZ
